Giovanni Colombo, Chiara Di Montegnacco Colombo e Marta Colombo. 
Presidente Onorario Peter Beyeler perché anche grazie a lui le presse cesoie TAURUS sono le migliori!
TAURUS, Always a step ahead!

The new Board of Directors of TAURUS 2025. 
Giovanni Colombo, Chiara Di Montegnacco Colombo and Marta Colombo. 
Honorary President Peter Beyeler because also thanks to him TAURUS shear balers are the best!
TAURUS, always a step ahead!

“CAT”, the transportable shear baler on tracked vehicle that adapts to your working needs.
The transportable shear baler has 2 independent remote controls, one for the shear and the other one for the traked vehicle: "2" is for safety, "2" is for ease of use; "2" is for not making mistakes, "2" is because 2 are the machines that make up the unit.
Discover more:
https://www.taurusweb.it/en/bluline-shears-balers/cat/

CAT: the TAURUS shear baler on tracks
Free to be...

🔩 RAPID: Power and High Performance. ⚙
A fusion of technology and expertise, strength and speed, robustness and structural simplicity.
RAPID shear balers are built for those who accept no compromises:
✅ High productivity
✅ Low energy consumption
✅ High-density, quality scrap output
🔧 Ideal for HEAVY DUTY applications:
▪ Demolition scrap
▪ Industrial waste
▪ Reinforced concrete rods
▪ Rails
📍 Monolithic, compact structure – easy to install, no foundation required.
🔋 Available in both diesel and electric versions.
👉 Trust in the strength of RAPID.
Engineered to last, built to perform.
#Taurus #shearbaler #shear #recyclingunit #recycle #Scrapmachine #ferraille #Ferrailleur #presse #cisalle #prensa #compactadora #chatarra #sucata #pressacesoia #CESOIA #rottame
TAURUS REDLINE BRAVO the best friend of your hammer mill!!! https://www.taurusweb.it/en/redline-preshredders-and-hammers-mills/bravo/

🔧 BRAVO: the pre-shredding solution that optimized hammer mill feeding

💥 The “Redripper BRAVO”, featuring counter-rotating horizontal shafts, is the pre-shredder specifically designed to handle bulky scrap, E.L.V., and compacted scrap bales before they enter the mill.

👉 Installed upstream of the hammer mill, it ensures homogeneous, continuous, and safe feeding.

📌 Equipped with the patented OSD OVERSTROKE tilting feed chute, BRAVO:

•	Increases productivity

•	Facilitates the intake of large and bulky materials

⚙️ Tangible benefits for metal scrap shredding and sorting plants:

• Eliminates explosion risks in the grinding chamber

• Reduces energy consumption

• Extends the lifespan of hammers, grids, and wear plates

• Prevents power surges and overloads

BRAVO boosts the performance of small and medium-sized plants, enabling them to process complex materials safely and efficiently.

📞 Want to learn more about how BRAVO can optimize your plant? Get in touch with us!  https://www.taurusweb.it/en/contact-us/

🌍 The scrap market is evolving. Today’s demands call for machines that are versatile, efficient, easy to maintain and relocate, and cost-effective.

🔥 QUATTRO is the answer. A shear baler designed for the future:
✅ High performance
✅ Low operating costs
✅ Easy installation and maintenance
✅ A fast return on investment

📌 QUATTRO is the result of over 60 years of hands-on experience.
It represents our vision of the ideal machine for the scrap industry of tomorrow.

🔧TIME TESTING🔧
The setting-up and testing of our TAURUS inclined shear is now complete! ✅

TR-VHD (Very Heavy Duty): very high capacity inclined shears, with cutting forces of up to 1800 tons, designed for continuous shearing of all types of scrap.
Ideal for processing profiles, pipes, pantograph sheets, mixed and bulky scrap, demolition materials, rails, rebar and more...
#Taurus #Inclined shear #Testing #Industry #Technology #Innovation #teamwork

🔷 BRAVO
🔩 Your hammer mill's best friend!

👉 BRAVO is the pre-shredder designed exclusively for:
✅ Uniforms the size
✅ Eliminates the cause of explosions in the grinding chamber
✅ Optimises mill output by up to +30%
✅ Preserves components and reduces downtime
✅ Raises the performance of small plants to the operational level of plants with higher installed power.

🌐 And thanks to TELEASSITENCE you can control the plant remotely, receive real-time diagnostics and intervene immediately, wherever you are.

🔧 E.L.V., bales, loose scraps? BRAVO turns them into value.

📩 Write to us now for more information!
